appInformation.name: Barcode Scanner
appInformation.description: Barcode Scanner can scan barcodes and view details about the scanned product. Or just about the number that is in that barcode.

serviceFeature.name: Facebook Share
serviceFeature.description: This will allow you to share scanned products directly via facebook.

serviceFeature.name: Keep scan history
serviceFeature.description: This will allow you to keep a history of your scanned products in a database.

serviceFeature.name: Use geo coordinates
serviceFeature.description: This will allow you to use geo coordinates, if the barcode requests them.

serviceFeature.name: Check account balance
serviceFeature.description: This will allow you to directly check your bank account's balance and tell you whether you could buy that product or not.
